name: Carracosta GX
author: PLANETA Tsuji

abilities.name: High Density Armor
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP, it takes 90 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Ground Crush
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Stone Age GX
attacks.effect: Put any number of Pokémon that evolve from Unidentified Fossil from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
